price: 74. Longola sé ibilisa asalaki lolendo mpe azalaki okati ya bapengwi.
arabic: إِلَّآ إِبۡلِيسَ ٱسۡتَكۡبَرَ وَكَانَ مِنَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: illā ib'līsa is'takbara wakāna mina al-kāfirīna
